recommendations.name: Venture Rewards
reason: Reason #1: This card offers a solid 2x miles on all purchases, which aligns well with the user's varied spending habits across different categories like travel, retail, dining, and groceries.

Reason #2: With its annual fee and a substantial signup bonus of 75,000 miles upon spending $4,000 in 3 months, Venture Rewards outperforms cards with lower rewards rates and no signup bonus, securing its spot as the top recommendation.
Reason #3: This card would be an ideal choice for the customer because the Venture Rewards card would improve their travel experiences, with benefits that will enhance future trips.

recommendations.name: Venture X Rewards
reason: Reason #1: This card provides a consistent rewards rate across all spending categories, indicating that the user would benefit from the card's features, like travel credits and lounge access, which can enhance the overall travel experience.

Reason #2: Ranking second, the Venture X Rewards card offers similar rewards to VentureOne Rewards but with a higher annual fee. This card is more suitable for users who can take full advantage of the premium travel benefits and credits.
Reason #3: The card will allow you to access exclusive travel benefits and perks that will further improve the quality of the cardholder's trips.

recommendations.name: Savor Rewards
reason: Reason #1: The card has a high rewards rate in the user's high spending categories.
Reason #2: This card ranks third because, despite the high annual spending, the rewards are not as high as the rewards that were offered with the other travel cards.
Reason #3: The card's bonus and rewards align with your spending habits, as the rewards rate in your spending categories will give you a return for your spending.
